CustomField.description: LEM-1181: Number of WorkSteps that are workable i.e. WorkStep's status is in Not Started, In Progress, Ready for QA, QA Complete, Blocked and Escalated in-case of single store onboarding. It indicates sum of workable WorkSteps under child WorkPlans on Parent WorkPlan in-case of multi-store onboarding.
CustomField.label: Number of Workable WorkSteps
